storyInfo: The studio plate is damaged by the Originium storm. Tippi, shocked by the culprit being her good friend, decides to save the plate. At the same time, Lucian finds Moira once more, who has already descended into madness.

attributes.content: What the...?! THIS is Greta's plan for the shoot?!
attributes.name: Angry Staff

attributes.content: The Originium storm's right in our faces! What are we, some sort of suicide squad?
attributes.name: Angry Staff

attributes.content: No... no way... This has to be the killer's doing, right? Didn't you hear the explosion earlier?
attributes.name: Scared Staff

attributes.content: Someone blew up the plate's cockpit... There's no way we can slow the plate down or change directions now...
attributes.name: Scared Staff

attributes.content: Right now we're only barely in contact with the storm, but once we hit its core...
attributes.name: Scared Staff

attributes.content: They're not gonna find even a single brick from this plate... *sob*...
attributes.name: Scared Staff

attributes.content: Alright, enough!
attributes.name: Angry Staff

attributes.content: So who on Terra was it? Their revenge wasn't enough for them, so now they're gonna take out the rest of us too?!
attributes.name: Angry Staff

attributes.content: The... murderer is Moira of the prop team...
attributes.name: Voice over the Wireless

attributes.content: What? Who's talking?
attributes.name: Angry Staff

attributes.content: I said! The killer responsible for the three murders is Moira!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Moira...? You're kidding me... That unremarkable Zalak?
attributes.name: Scared Staff

attributes.content: Miss Stone caught her red-handed!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: If Lucian weren't there, she would've become the next victim!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: ...So where's the little rat now? I'll go find her myself!
attributes.name: Angry Staff

attributes.content: And what's the point of confronting a psycho killer when you can't even save yourself?!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: She owes us an explanation! What if she gets innocents killed?!
attributes.name: Angry Staff

attributes.content: You think I haven't thought of that?!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: I already switched the wireless comms to broadcast mode to ensure I survive this. I'm sure everyone outside the plate has heard the truth by now.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: The killer's trapped like a rat.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: I have to live, I have to... Once I get back to central Wrankwood, all the bombshells I've collected these past few days will be enough to buy me a villa in Siesta—
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Shit! The plate's tilting towards the Originium storm again!
attributes.name: Angry Staff

attributes.content: Right, the landboats! We can use them to escape!
attributes.name: Scared Staff

attributes.content: ...They're gone.
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Angry Staff

attributes.content: I went over to the emergency escape cabin earlier, and they were already wrecked by the storm... every last one of them...
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: There's no way out for us now...
attributes.name: Scared Staff

attributes.content: ...If I'm going to die anyway, I might as well take the chance and jump off the plate... I...
attributes.name: Scared Staff

attributes.content: Cut that shit out!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: Just move! Anywhere's safer than the film set! Let's go hide underground in the engine layer!
attributes.name: Camera Assistant

attributes.content: There truly are so many things to learn from the set design of a horror film... Thank you, Tippi.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: No problem!
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: I have to get back and start making the visualizations for most of the visual effects first, then we'll finalize the details after Director Quay is done with the script.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Like I promised, I'm gonna design you a finale that'll leave Lady Dupont in the cinema history!
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Right, I'm looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: (Wait, how long have we talking about this? Did Molly ever find a way to escape—)
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Ahh—!
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Wh-What now?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: That's not good.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Wait, there's a voice from the comms...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Catastrophe... *bzzt*... control cabin... destroyed...
attributes.name: Voice over the Wireless

attributes.content: Why's the signal so bad? It sounded like Abner's assistant. What kinda trouble is he getting into now—
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: The control cabin... has been destroyed...
attributes.name: Voice over the Wireless

attributes.content: The plate... is rushing towards the Catastrophe...
attributes.name: Voice over the Wireless

attributes.content: ...killer... is Moira...
attributes.name: Voice over the Wireless

attributes.content: Tippi grips the wireless walkie-talkie and turns the volume knob as high as she can, but it stays silent.
She must have misheard, she thinks.
But if so, why is Miss Rutherford looking at her with such a sullen expression?
No... There's no way...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Tippi... I can't imagine anyone would joke about that in these circumstances.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: But... When would she have even had the opportunity?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: The nights when Shelly, Michael, and Marion died, she was watching movies with me the whole time, there wasn't—
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Was there really no opportunity?
Tippi doubts her own mind.
Was Molly really right next to her the whole time during their movie nights?
No...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: We always watched multiple movies back to back, so sometimes she'd leave when I was switching out the tape...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Sometimes she'd say Miss Stone was looking for her, sometimes it was to pick up something she forgot on the film set...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: I'm sure you know how she's like, ma'am. She's still new to being the prop master and under, like, a ton of pressure, but she's super committed to her work...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Darling...
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: No, no, that only explains how she could've done it! It doesn't prove that she did...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: A motive! Why would she kill all those people she had nothing to do with? Why don't I know anything?
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Darling, maybe you didn't know your friend as well as you thought you did.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Let's just focus on the movie... so stop looking away from the screen!
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Sorry, there's just been so much going on with the film crew lately, I'm... I'm a little nervous...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm here for you, girl!
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: No matter who I am, one thing's for sure: I'm your best friend on this crew.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Or maybe... maybe she never even thought of me as a friend...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Maybe she was just... using me...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: The Liberi girl's head sinks.
She speaks no more.
Melanie hugs the little Liberi in front of her.
The girl who was consoling her just a few hours ago is now crying on her shoulder.
Melanie pats her back. She asks no questions, nor does she say anything about the price of growing up. She only hugs her.
Let's just leave this place first, Tippi.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: The convoluted structure here will only put us in danger if the plate gets too close to the Catastrophe core.
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: We would be safer underground, though that too may be futile if the plate doesn't change direction...
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: Underground...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Over Melanie's shoulders, Tippi spots some of the material they salvaged from the horror film earlier.
'Underground'—The word circles around her brain.
Wait, I got it!
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: What? You've recovered your pep already?
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: No, I figured out how to change the plate's trajectory!
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: There was once a crew that snuck into another Wrankwood plate to film secretly—to save on rental costs—and they ended up with a super cool scary movie...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: I re-watched it recently.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: But that plate and the one we're standing on both came from the same batch made by Wrankwood...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: So basically, the specs should be pretty much the same.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: If my hunch is right... there should be another control cabin at the bottom of the engine layer.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: ...What are our odds of making it there?
attributes.name: Melanie

attributes.content: To be honest... no idea.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: But never tell me the odds. I gotta try.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: There's no point mulling over something I can't answer on my own. Only when we're out of this crisis...
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: Will I be able to get the truth from her.
attributes.name: Tippi

attributes.content: (Gentle singing♪)
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: (Cheerful whistling♪)
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: So this is where you were, Lucian.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: That was my sister's favorite song. On breaks between shooting she'd often look to the sky and hum the tune.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I thought you'd already woken up.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Thanks to you. You showed me the truth I was blind to... and how cruel they truly were.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Then what are you doing now?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: A rumbling comes from beneath their feet. The Wrankwood plate rushes towards the Catastrophe as the crew panics. No one would think to enter the prop room now, when they should be escaping.
But it is at this very moment that the prop master gets to work.
She goes around the room, fiddling with one mannequin after another, dressing them in clothes, correcting their postures... Her earnest focus is fully on them.
I only just remembered how I recognized Laura.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: If you will allow me a guess... you met someone.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Yes, a very gentle Feline.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: The weather was terrible that day. I was sitting on a bench for a long time, and there was water on my face—probably rain, but maybe tears...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: The accident was caused by the negligence of the person in charge, but in the end I was the one who had to pay compensation and was kicked off the crew.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I didn't know anyone in Wrankwood, so I was no stranger to being treated like that.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I ran away from home, you know. After my parents died, there was nowhere else to go. So the only thing left for me was...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Death.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Then that person sat next to me. We didn't talk the entire time. He only gently waited for me to calm down...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: But when he left, I realized a cassette tape was sitting on my knee.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: That man brought Laura into my life, at a time when there was only darkness.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: She became my sister. She protected me, encouraged me, and helped me pull myself together...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Laura was already long dead by then.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Her background, experiences, and even appearance all resembled yours. The man gave you motivation when you were at your lowest...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: As well as anger, confusion, and a deep-rooted thirst for vengeance...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: No doubt, that was no better than before.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Was that grief I saw flash through your eyes...? Or... pity? No, that's not it either...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: More like... understanding, sympathy.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Did something similar happen to you?
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Do you know him?
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: He's an expert at grafting non-existent joy and anger onto your life, much like how an unscrupulous director adds extra elements as he pleases to a story he deems dull...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Oh, I suppose you would call it 'ad-libbing' in the film industry.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: He pulls you from one pit of despair while guiding you into another, thus inciting the so-called beauty of drama.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: ...He's an old acquaintance, my teacher, the source of all my suffering, and a phantom that should be long dead.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Finding you, finding him...
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Is the very reason I came here.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Moira, I'm sorry for denying all that you have.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: No. It's not like that.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Moira finishes arranging her last mannequin, and returns to the center of the prop room.
She does a curtsy in Lucian's direction, and lightly taps her fingertips.
Lucian then realizes something has changed, and looks over to see that every mannequin has come 'alive'.
I don't think you've denied me.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: In my worst hour, Laura appeared by my side, and has accompanied me for a long time now...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: She's my sister, as I am hers.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I don't regret avenging her. I don't regret shouldering all these sins.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I will also be the last person in this land to remember her.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I cry, I laugh, I rage, I doubt, I hate, I grieve, I yearn...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: And thus I have them, these intense feelings I would never have had otherwise.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I am alive.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: The mannequins begin to move.
Lucian recognizes who they were modeled after... the deceased Dalton, Shelly, Michael, Marion, and also Moira herself.
Moira stretches out her hand, and holds her mannequins' hands one by one as they move past her.
No music except the trembling ground accompanies their movements, but the tiny Zalak prop master seems to have become the most passionate dancer on the land, as she embraces her myriad...
Strange, yet elegant.
I should be thanking you, Lucian. You helped me realize it.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: When there was nothing left of 'Moira' anymore...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I felt as if I became a mirror, and that I could become—
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Anyone!
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Wake up.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Satisfaction born from despair is nothing but poison.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: I've never been more awake in my entire life.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Would you also like to become my dance partner?
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: ...Just like them.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: As Moira finishes speaking, her dance partners throw themselves at Lucian—
